questions.title: How do you handle challenging situations?
options: I rely on logic and reason to find solutions
I trust my intuition and feelings
I seek guidance from others
I adapt my approach depending on the situation

questions.title: When making decisions, do you usually:
options: Consider all available information and analyze it
Go with your gut feeling
Ask for advice from friends, family or colleagues
Take into account both objective information and personal feelings

questions.title: How do you perceive yourself in social interactions?
options: Introverted and reserved
Extroverted and outgoing
A mix of both introverted and extroverted
It depends on the situation and the people I'm with

questions.title: How do you prefer to spend your free time?
options: Engaging in intellectual pursuits or hobbies
Spending time with close friends or family
Enjoying solitary activities or relaxation
A balance of socializing and solitary activities

questions.title: How do you approach problem-solving?
options: I analyze the problem and look for logical solutions
I rely on my intuition and emotions to guide me
I seek input from others and consider their perspectives
I use a combination of logic, intuition, and input from others

questions.title: What is your preferred learning style?
options: Reading, writing, and researching
Listening, discussing, and collaborating
Hands-on and experiential learning
A combination of various learning styles

questions.title: How do you express your emotions?
options: I'm open and transparent about my feelings
I tend to keep my emotions to myself
I share my emotions with only a few close people
It depends on the situation and the people I'm with
